verses.verse: ( Paul’s Greeting to Timothy) ( ( 610 1:1-2 )) Παῦλος <WG3972> Paulos Paul , ἀπόστολος <WG652> apostolos an apostle Χριστοῦ <WG5547> Christou of Christ Ἰησοῦ <WG2424> Iēsou Jesus διὰ <WG1223> dia by θελήματος <WG2307> thelēmatos [the] will Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God , κατ’ <WG2596> kat’ according to ἐπαγγελίαν <WG1860> epangelian [the] promise ζωῆς <WG2222> zōēs of life τῆς <WG3588> tēs - ἐν <WG1722> en in Χριστῷ <WG5547> Christō Christ Ἰησοῦ <WG2424> Iēsou Jesus ,

Τιμοθέῳ <WG5095> Timotheō To Timothy , ἀγαπητῷ <WG27> agapētō [my] beloved τέκνῳ <WG5043> teknō child : Χάρις <WG5485> Charis Grace , ἔλεος <WG1656> eleos mercy , εἰρήνη <WG1515> eirēnē [and] peace ἀπὸ <WG575> apo from Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou God Πατρὸς <WG3962> Patros [the] Father καὶ <WG2532> kai and Χριστοῦ <WG5547> Christou Christ Ἰησοῦ <WG2424> Iēsou Jesus τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Κυρίου <WG2962> Kyriou Lord . ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn our

Χάριν <WG5485> Charin thank ( Faithfulness under Persecution) ἔχω <WG2192> echō I τῷ <WG3588> tō - Θεῷ <WG2316> Theō God , ᾧ <WG3739> hō whom λατρεύω <WG3000> latreuō I serve ἀπὸ <WG575> apo as did προγόνων <WG4269> progonōn [my] forefathers , ἐν <WG1722> en with καθαρᾷ <WG2513> kathara a clear συνειδήσει <WG4893> syneidēsei conscience ὡς <WG5613> hōs as ἀδιάλειπτον <WG88> adialeipton constantly ἔχω <WG2192> echō I τὴν <WG3588> tēn - περὶ <WG4012> peri - σοῦ <WG4771> sou you μνείαν <WG3417> mneian remember ἐν <WG1722> en in ταῖς <WG3588> tais - δεήσεσίν <WG1162> deēsesin prayers . μου <WG1473> mou my νυκτὸς <WG3571> nyktos night καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἡμέρας <WG2250> hēmeras day

ἐπιποθῶν <WG1971> epipothōn I long σε <WG4771> se you ἰδεῖν <WG3708> idein to see μεμνημένος <WG3403> memnēmenos Recalling σου <WG4771> sou your τῶν <WG3588> tōn - δακρύων <WG1144> dakryōn tears , ἵνα <WG2443> hina so that χαρᾶς <WG5479> charas with joy . πληρωθῶ <WG4137> plērōthō I may be filled

ὑπόμνησιν <WG5280> hypomnēsin I am reminded λαβὼν <WG2983> labōn vvv τῆς <WG3588> tēs of ἐν <WG1722> en - σοὶ <WG4771> soi your ἀνυποκρίτου <WG505> anypokritou sincere πίστεως <WG4102> pisteōs faith , ἥτις <WG3748> hētis which ἐνῴκησεν <WG1774> enōkēsen dwelt πρῶτον <WG4412> prōton first ἐν <WG1722> en in τῇ <WG3588> tē - μάμμῃ <WG3125> mammē grandmother σου <WG4771> sou your Λωΐδι <WG3090> Lōidi Lois καὶ <WG2532> kai and τῇ <WG3588> tē - μητρί <WG3384> mētri mother σου <WG4771> sou your Εὐνίκῃ <WG2131> Eunikē Eunice , πέπεισμαι <WG3982> pepeismai I am convinced δὲ <WG1161> de and ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - καὶ <WG2532> kai as well . ἐν <WG1722> en [is] in σοί <WG4771> soi you

Δι’ <WG1223> Di’ For ἣν <WG3739> hēn this αἰτίαν <WG156> aitian reason ἀναμιμνῄσκω <WG363> anamimnēskō I remind σε <WG4771> se you ἀναζωπυρεῖν <WG329> anazōpyrein to fan into flame τὸ <WG3588> to the χάρισμα <WG5486> charisma gift τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God , ὅ <WG3739> ho which ἐστιν <WG1510> estin is ἐν <WG1722> en in σοὶ <WG4771> soi you διὰ <WG1223> dia through τῆς <WG3588> tēs the ἐπιθέσεως <WG1936> epitheseōs laying on τῶν <WG3588> tōn of χειρῶν <WG5495> cheirōn hands . μου <WG1473> mou my

οὐ <WG3756> ou has not γὰρ <WG1063> gar For ἔδωκεν <WG1325> edōken given ἡμῖν <WG1473> hēmin us ὁ <WG3588> ho - Θεὸς <WG2316> Theos God πνεῦμα <WG4151> pneuma a spirit δειλίας <WG1167> deilias of fear , ( Or timidity or cowardice) ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla but δυνάμεως <WG1411> dynameōs of power , καὶ <WG2532> kai - ἀγάπης <WG26> agapēs love , καὶ <WG2532> kai and σωφρονισμοῦ <WG4995> sōphronismou self-control .

Μὴ <WG3361> Mē vvv οὖν <WG3767> oun So ἐπαισχυνθῇς <WG1870> epaischynthēs do not be ashamed of τὸ <WG3588> to the μαρτύριον <WG3142> martyrion testimony τοῦ <WG3588> tou of Κυρίου <WG2962> Kyriou Lord , ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn our μηδὲ <WG3366> mēde [or] ἐμὲ <WG1473> eme of me , τὸν <WG3588> ton - δέσμιον <WG1198> desmion prisoner . αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou His ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla Instead , συνκακοπάθησον <WG4777> synkakopathēson join me in suffering τῷ <WG3588> tō for the εὐαγγελίῳ <WG2098> euangeliō gospel κατὰ <WG2596> kata by δύναμιν <WG1411> dynamin [the] power Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God .

τοῦ <WG3588> tou [He] σώσαντος <WG4982> sōsantos has saved ἡμᾶς <WG1473> hēmas us καὶ <WG2532> kai and καλέσαντος <WG2564> kalesantos called [us] κλήσει <WG2821> klēsei calling , ἁγίᾳ <WG40> hagia to a holy οὐ <WG3756> ou not κατὰ <WG2596> kata because of τὰ <WG3588> ta - ἔργα <WG2041> erga works , ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn our ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla but κατὰ <WG2596> kata by ἰδίαν <WG2398> idian His own πρόθεσιν <WG4286> prothesin purpose καὶ <WG2532> kai and χάριν <WG5485> charin [by the] grace τὴν <WG3588> tēn - δοθεῖσαν <WG1325> dotheisan He granted ἡμῖν <WG1473> hēmin us ἐν <WG1722> en in Χριστῷ <WG5547> Christō Christ Ἰησοῦ <WG2424> Iēsou Jesus πρὸ <WG4253> pro before χρόνων <WG5550> chronōn time αἰωνίων <WG166> aiōniōn began . ( Literally before times eternal)

φανερωθεῖσαν <WG5319> phanerōtheisan He has revealed [this grace] δὲ <WG1161> de And νῦν <WG3568> nyn now διὰ <WG1223> dia through τῆς <WG3588> tēs the ἐπιφανείας <WG2015> epiphaneias appearing τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Σωτῆρος <WG4990> Sōtēros Savior , ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn of our Χριστοῦ <WG5547> Christou Christ Ἰησοῦ <WG2424> Iēsou Jesus , καταργήσαντος <WG2673> katargēsantos [who] has abolished μὲν <WG3303> men - τὸν <WG3588> ton - θάνατον <WG2288> thanaton death φωτίσαντος <WG5461> phōtisantos illuminated the way to δὲ <WG1161> de and ζωὴν <WG2222> zōēn life καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἀφθαρσίαν <WG861> aphtharsian immortality διὰ <WG1223> dia through τοῦ <WG3588> tou the εὐαγγελίου <WG2098> euangeliou gospel ,

εἰς <WG1519> eis to ὃ <WG3739> ho which ἐτέθην <WG5087> etethēn was appointed ἐγὼ <WG1473> egō I κήρυξ <WG2783> kēryx [as] a preacher , καὶ <WG2532> kai - ἀπόστολος <WG652> apostolos an apostle , καὶ <WG2532> kai and διδάσκαλος <WG1320> didaskalos a teacher .

Δι’ <WG1223> Di’ For ἣν <WG3739> hēn this αἰτίαν <WG156> aitian reason , καὶ <WG2532> kai even [though] ταῦτα <WG3778> tauta [as I do] , πάσχω <WG3958> paschō I suffer ἀλλ’ <WG235> all’ - οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv ἐπαισχύνομαι <WG1870> epaischynomai I am not ashamed ; οἶδα <WG1492> oida I know γὰρ <WG1063> gar for ᾧ <WG3739> hō whom πεπίστευκα <WG4100> pepisteuka I have believed , καὶ <WG2532> kai and πέπεισμαι <WG3982> pepeismai I am convinced ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that δυνατός <WG1415> dynatos able ἐστιν <WG1510> estin He is τὴν <WG3588> tēn what παραθήκην <WG3866> parathēkēn I have entrusted [to Him] ( Or what He has entrusted to me) μου <WG1473> mou vvv φυλάξαι <WG5442> phylaxai to guard εἰς <WG1519> eis for ἐκείνην <WG1565> ekeinēn that τὴν <WG3588> tēn - ἡμέραν <WG2250> hēmeran day .

Ὑποτύπωσιν <WG5296> Hypotypōsin [to the] pattern ( Holding to Sound Teaching) ἔχε <WG2192> eche Hold on ὑγιαινόντων <WG5198> hygiainontōn of sound λόγων <WG3056> logōn teaching ( Literally sound words) ὧν <WG3739> hōn - παρ’ <WG3844> par’ from ἐμοῦ <WG1473> emou me , ἤκουσας <WG191> ēkousas you have heard ἐν <WG1722> en with πίστει <WG4102> pistei [the] faith καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἀγάπῃ <WG26> agapē love τῇ <WG3588> tē that [are] ἐν <WG1722> en in Χριστῷ <WG5547> Christō Christ Ἰησοῦ <WG2424> Iēsou Jesus .

τὴν <WG3588> tēn the καλὴν <WG2570> kalēn treasure παραθήκην <WG3866> parathēkēn entrusted [to you] , ( Or the good deposit entrusted to you) φύλαξον <WG5442> phylaxon Guard διὰ <WG1223> dia with the help of Πνεύματος <WG4151> Pneumatos Spirit Ἁγίου <WG40> Hagiou [the] Holy τοῦ <WG3588> tou who ἐνοικοῦντος <WG1774> enoikountos dwells ἐν <WG1722> en in ἡμῖν <WG1473> hēmin us .

Οἶδας <WG1492> Oidas You know τοῦτο <WG3778> touto - ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that ἀπεστράφησάν <WG654> apestraphēsan has deserted με <WG1473> me me , πάντες <WG3956> pantes everyone οἱ <WG3588> hoi - ἐν <WG1722> en in τῇ <WG3588> tē - Ἀσίᾳ <WG773> Asia [the Province of] Asia ( Literally in Asia; Asia was a Roman province in what is now western Turkey.) ὧν <WG3739> hōn including ἐστιν <WG1510> estin . . . Φύγελος <WG5436> Phygelos Phygelus καὶ <WG2532> kai and Ἑρμογένης <WG2061> Hermogenēs Hermogenes .

ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla Indeed , γενόμενος <WG1096> genomenos when he arrived ἐν <WG1722> en in Ῥώμῃ <WG4516> Rhōmē Rome , σπουδαίως <WG4709> spoudaiōs vvv ἐζήτησέν <WG2212> ezētēsen he searched diligently με <WG1473> me me . καὶ <WG2532> kai [until] εὗρεν <WG2147> heuren he found

Δῴη <WG1325> Dōē grant αὐτῷ <WG846> autō [Onesiphorus] ὁ <WG3588> ho May the Κύριος <WG2962> Kyrios Lord εὑρεῖν <WG2147> heurein - ἔλεος <WG1656> eleos mercy παρὰ <WG3844> para vvv Κυρίου <WG2962> Kyriou [His] ἐν <WG1722> en on ἐκείνῃ <WG1565> ekeinē that τῇ <WG3588> tē - ἡμέρᾳ <WG2250> hēmera day . καὶ <WG2532> kai - ὅσα <WG3745> hosa how much ἐν <WG1722> en in Ἐφέσῳ <WG2181> Ephesō Ephesus . διηκόνησεν <WG1247> diēkonēsen he ministered [to me] βέλτιον <WG957> beltion very well σὺ <WG4771> sy You γινώσκεις <WG1097> ginōskeis know
